channel.title: Homes on René Reitmann
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on René Reitmann

item.description: Biography I am currently employed by HDI AG as a software engineer. In the past I have worked in different projects as a backend developer or full stack developer as well as DevOp or Scrum Master. At DZHW, for example, I worked in an interdisciplinary team to develop a search and documentation portal for the datasets available at the Research Data Center of the DZHW. This portal continues to be developed openly at GitHub.

item.title: Employers
item.description: During my studies and in the years thereafter up to and including today I was employed by the following companies: HDI (April 2023 - today) Senior Software Engineer Magicline (February 2022 - June 2022) Senior Software Engineer DZHW (July 2015 - December 2021) Senior Software Engineer Zühlke Engineering (June 2010 - July 2015) Senior Software Engineer KKH (March 2010 - May 2010) IT-Coordinator Capgemini Germany (January 2006 - February 2010) IT Consultant Virtusa (November 2004 - March 2005) Intern innovative Systems (April 2004 - October 2004) Diploma/Student Trainee

item.title: Education
item.description: Certified Scrum Master at Scrum Alliance (April 2015) IREB Certified Professional for Requirements Engineering, Foundation Level (August 2011) ISTQB Certified Tester, Foundation Level (October 2010) Training „Conflict Management“ at Stöger & Partner (February 2009) School „SOA“ at Capgemini (November 2008) School „System Integration“ at Capgemini (March 2008) Training „Moderation“ at Stöger & Partner (October 2007) Training „Presentation“ at Stöger & Partner (December 2006) Studied Economic Mathematics at TU Clausthal and QUB Belfast (1999 - 2005), diploma grade: 1,3 Secondary School at Albert-Einstein-Schule KGS Laatzen (1991 - 1998), final grade: 1,8

item.title: Spare Time
item.description: If I’m not doing one of the roles I have mentioned earlier, here’s what I’m doing: Play Table Tennis at TSV Rethen Being Administrator of “WEG Fontainestraße 6” Play Pan-Pong
